body: Good stuff ^_^ Gotta love the love. And the anal
I'm hearing my old internet connection sound seeing this my innocence was out the window when i played this

So based off an "Eroge"? Nice. / Always a nice feeling of seeing a Loli in Twintail and Long hair, Silky smooth and Black in color that is. | Still a feeling of guilt because in some panel her face remind me of thoose with the same feature, in sad Story.

@sakuraifuu35 thanks didn't know that was the story around the game's development.  There is ass spreading in the doggy style sex scene, but no full on anal.  Such a well made scene, I can see why fans wanted it.  Considering the prep working need for realistic anal sex and the characters, I can also see why Mu Soft didn't.  If they where going for realism.  It'd a shame that was the last game they made.  HappyLambBarn is said to be inspired by Mu Soft, but they miss the cuteness mark, instead going for a darker theme.  No can't have two characters get into a relationship just by being close to each other, just has to be demons.  Trainers are closer to Mu Soft works, kinda off the top of my head; Teaching Feeling, With a Older Girl Yuina, 1room, Wet Summer Days, Summer Life in the Countryside.  All closer to that style of game, just the artwork is sadly left behind with Mu Soft.  Tony Taka's works are similar in art style.  Anyway thanks again @Sakuraifuu!

@Shattered Star 
Probably a second expansion pack that never got released. People wanted an actual anal scene with the loli, but creator never delivered.

This is a parody of a game called Hizashi no Naka no Riaru, or 陽射しの中のリアル by Mu Soft. The last page has cans of those hot snacks she's eating on the 4th day.  Any version you find on English aggregate sites will likely be fully translated, decensored, and modded to mostly work with windows 10 etc, as it is a very old game at this point. It still looks good even by today's standards, maybe not the gui, but it works. What I want to know, the afterward mentions a expansion pack, is there plans to expand/remake Hizashi no Naka no Riaru? Or is it another game?
Great work Bizen sensei plump loli ass uooogghhh 😭😭😭
